event.title: Free and open source Software, Brussels, Belgium
event.body: Together with Stefano Zacchiroli (Debian) and Simon Phipps (Open Source Initiative, MariaDB Foundation), FSFE's Vice President Matthias Kirschner will discuss the challenges of Free Software. The panel discussion is from 17:00 until 18:00. The conference is organised by the European Pirates and MEP Amelia Andersdotter and takes place in the European Parliament and is free of charge.
